title: Semi-Autonomous Robotic System for efficient recycling of Lithium-Ion Batteries
excerpt: This paper is about a method to recycle Li-Ion batteries using robotics solution.
citation: S. Gadgil, D. Gaikwad, B. Sebastian, A. Dubey and A. Upadhyay, "Semi-Autonomous Robotic System for Efficient Recycling of Lithium-Ion Batteries," 2024 International Conference on E-mobility, Power Control and Smart Systems (ICEMPS), Thiruvananthapuram, India, 2024, pp. 1-7, doi: 10.1109/ICEMPS60684.2024.10559331.
